author: jwasinger
content: https://github.com/a16z/vectorized-fields - potentially interesting:  library that implements vectorized operations over bn254 field using avx512

author: jwasinger
content: https://hal.science/hal-02552673/document - another interesting resource I found a few weeks ago:  the relevant example from this is the pseudocode for implementing modular multiplication where the chosen modulus is a 50 bit prime.
